rules_text:
Reach
[i]True Love[/i] – When Cordelia enters, create a Lover Role token, and attach it to a creature you control . [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has “Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you gain 1 life”.)[/i]
[i]Unbreakable Bond[/i] – Enchanted creatures you control get +0/+2.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Cordelia attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, create a Lover Role token, and attach it to a creature you control.
